evaluation.Q1: Does the chart effectively compare average N, P, K values across different crops?

feedback.improvement: The grouped bar chart structure effectively shows N, P, K values for different crops
Consider adding more crop types to provide a more comprehensive comparison

evaluation.Q2: Are the values for rice and wheat visually distinct from other crops?

feedback.improvement: The color scheme clearly distinguishes rice (blue) and wheat (green) from other crops (red)
Adjust the wheat color to be more visually distinct from rice

evaluation.Q3: Is the chart type appropriate for comparing multiple factors (N, P, K) across different crops?

feedback.improvement: The grouped bar chart is suitable for comparing multiple factors across categories

evaluation.Q4: Are text annotations present for rice and wheat, showing their average N, P, K values?

feedback.improvement: Text annotations are present for rice and wheat
Correct the wheat annotation which currently shows 'nan' values

evaluation.Q5: Is the chart easily understandable for agricultural researchers, farmers, and policymakers?

feedback.improvement: The chart layout and labeling are clear and straightforward
Include a brief explanation of N, P, K for audiences less familiar with these terms

evaluation.Q6: Does the chart have clear and accurate axis labels for crops and nutrient values?

feedback.improvement: The x-axis clearly shows N, P, K nutrients and the y-axis shows average values
Include units for the average values on the y-axis

evaluation.Q7: Is there a clear visual hierarchy that emphasizes rice and wheat data without overshadowing other crops?

feedback.improvement: Rice and wheat are emphasized through color and annotations without overwhelming other data

evaluation.Q8: Does the color scheme effectively differentiate between crops and enhance readability?

feedback.improvement: The color scheme differentiates between crops effectively
Consider using more contrasting colors for wheat and rice for better differentiation

evaluation.Q9: Is the overall layout well-spaced and not overcrowded?

feedback.improvement: The chart has good spacing and is not overcrowded

evaluation.Q10: Does the chart have a clear, concise title that explains its content?

feedback.improvement: The title 'Average N, P, K Values for Different Crops' is clear and concise

evaluation.Q11: Are the font sizes and styles consistent and appropriate throughout the chart?

feedback.improvement: Font sizes and styles are consistent throughout the chart

evaluation.Q12: Is the chart free from unnecessary complexity or extraneous details?

feedback.improvement: The chart is simple and focused on the essential information

evaluation.Q13: Would the chart be easily readable for individuals with color vision deficiencies?

feedback.improvement: Use more contrasting colors or patterns to differentiate between crops for better accessibility

evaluation.Q14: Does the chart maintain a professional appearance suitable for presentation to agricultural professionals?

feedback.improvement: The chart has a clean, professional appearance

evaluation.Q15: Is there a legend explaining any color coding or symbols used in the chart?

feedback.improvement: The legend clearly explains the color coding for different crops
